post_title: SOLD: George Stovall portrait back run
post_content:
Anyone interested in a George Stovall portrait back run? The group includes one of each of the following:

P150
P350
SC150 f.25
SC150 f.30
SC350 f.25
SC350 f.30
Sov150
Sov350
EPDG
OM (rare)

[STRIKE]$800 takes the group.[/STRIKE] SOLD
